item.title: Manage Python Environments Faster With Aliases and Functions
item.description: If you aren’t regularly wiping and rebuilding your virtual environments, you should be; anyone trying to run your project for the first time will thank you for it.

item.title: Building DAGs with Make, SQL, and python
item.description: In data science and engineering we tend to think in “DAGs” (directed acyclic graphs), which just means “to make this report, we first have to build this other thing, and to build that thing, we have to run these two queries, and so on.

item.title: Objective
item.description: Why create a new tech blog when so many great ones already exist?
